question: India-U.S. Counter-Terrorism Designations Dialogue was held in __________.
explanation: On 18th and 19th December 2017, the inaugural India-U.S. Counter-Terrorism Designations Dialogue was held in New Delhi. India-U.S. Counter-Terrorism Designations Dialogue increasing bilateral cooperation on terrorism-related designations was discussed.Information regarding procedures for pursuing designations against terrorist groups and individuals, through domestic and international mechanisms were exchanged.
